welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Solnechnogorsk, a charming city nestled amidst picturesque landscapes! Known for its stunning natural beauty and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and embrace the warmth and hospitality of our community."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Sheremetyevo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The older terminal at Sheremetyevo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sheremetyevo Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The terminal at Sheremetyevo Airport dedicated to flights operated by Aeroflot.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The terminal at Sheremetyevo Airport dedicated to flights operated by other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The terminal at Sheremetyevo Airport dedicated to low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
